thread.title: BRIEF-Software AG to buy back shares worth up to 70 mln eur
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Software AG to buy back shares worth up to 70 mln eur | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Software AG to buy back shares worth up to 70 mln eur
text:
Sept 3 Software AG : * Dgap-adhoc: Software AG decides on share buyback * Says to conduct a buyback of own shares in a value of up to EUR 70 million * Says that equates to a volume of up to approx. 2,914,238 shares * Says share buyback will be conducted through a bank and exclusively on the
stock exchange * Says shares bought back may be used for all purposes permissible Source text for Eikon:
